item.title: Square Root Decomposition
item.description: Square Root Decomposition Square Root Decomposition is an algorithm for answering range queries, in $\mathcal{O}(Q\sqrt{N})$, where $Q$ is the number of queries and $N$ is the number of elements in the range. It is very useful in a lot of CP questions. The basic technique of Square Root Decomposition can be used for doing certain queries on Trees as well. Motivation Let us look at a problem, to motivate the need for this algorithm.
